intro: See what the bodycam saw. Survive what it didn’t.
description:
Face pure terror in an endless maze where reality twists and death is always near. Escape the Backrooms: BODYCAM blends tactical bodycam shooting with intense psychological horror.

As an operator on a mission gone wrong, you’re trapped in the shifting Backrooms—and survival depends on your reflexes, choices, and nerve.

Key Features:
	•	Hyper-Realistic Bodycam View: Immersive visuals with screen shake, authentic motion, and eerie sound design.
	•	Lethal  Enemies: Armed, aggressive, and unpredictable enemies—every fight could be your last.
	•	Evolving Levels: The deeper you go, the more distorted and dangerous the world becomes.
	•	Survival Strategy: Scavenge, fight, or run—every action counts.
	•	Camcorder Mechanics: Record clues, track changes, and uncover the hidden truth.
	•	Dynamic Quest System: Solve cryptic quests to uncover hidden clues, weapons, and essential tools for survival. Each task brings you closer to the truth—but may also unleash unexpected dangers.

Escape the Backrooms: BODYCAM delivers brutal realism, escalating dread, and one goal: survive.
